INTERSHOP IOM 5.2.0-SNAPSHOT Database Model   (revision 27f42750ba6a552ca78a274aa0a4757f51559d71)

Table oms.PaymentActionApprovalDefDO

List of payment action approvals that should be used by a shop.
Therefore a relation of shop, payment provider and payment method (see Shop2PaymentProvider2PaymentDefDO) is linked to payment actions an approval should be processed for, e.g. for authorization.

Columns 

References[1] Column Type Constraints[2] Default Comment
id integer PK, UNIQUE, NOT_NULL  
doProcess boolean NOT_NULL  
doManualApprove boolean NOT_NULL  
PaymentNotificationActionDefDO paymentNotificationActionDefRef integer NOT_NULL  
Shop2PaymentProvider2PaymentDefDO shop2PaymentProvider2PaymentRef integer NOT_NULL  

[1] Not all references are enforced by a foreign key where they could.
Such "missing" foreign keys are denoted with [[ ]].

[2] Constraints:
PK : the column is part of the primary key
UNIQUE: does don't cover unique constraints and indexes defined on more than one column.

Constraints and Indexes 

Type Name Definition
PRIMARY KEY PaymentActionApprovalDefDO_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id) 
FOREIGN KEY PaymentActionApprovalDefDO_fk_PaymentNotificationAction FOREIGN KEY ("paymentNotificationActionDefRef") REFERENCES "PaymentNotificationActionDefDO"(id) 
FOREIGN KEY PaymentActionApprovalDefDO_fk_shp2PymntPrvdr2PymntRf FOREIGN KEY ("shop2PaymentProvider2PaymentRef") REFERENCES "Shop2PaymentProvider2PaymentDefDO"(id)
